trans-unit.source: Identifies the type of data operation performed by a method, as specified by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute" /> applied to the method.

The following code example demonstrates how you can apply the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> to a publicly exposed method and identify the type of data operation it performs as well as whether it is the type's default data method.
trans-unit.target: 次のコード例では、適用する方法を示しています、<xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>をパブリックに公開されたメソッドとデータの操作を実行できるだけでなく、その型の既定のデータのメソッドであるかどうかの種類を特定します。

trans-unit.source: In this example the `NorthwindEmployee` type exposes two different data methods: one to retrieve a set of data named `GetAllEmployees`, and one to delete data named `DeleteEmployeeByID`.
trans-unit.target: この例では、`NorthwindEmployee`型は、2 つの異なるデータ メソッドを公開: という名前のデータのセットを取得する 1 つ`GetAllEmployees`、という名前のデータを削除して`DeleteEmployeeByID`です。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute> is applied to both methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute>は両方のメソッドに適用します。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a method is used for a data operation that deletes data.
Indicates that a method is used for a data operation that fills a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> object.
Indicates that a method is used for a data operation that inserts data.
Indicates that a method is used for a data operation that retrieves data.
Indicates that a method is used for a data operation that updates data.
